document_data.name: Alak Xorlarrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Alak Xorlarrin''' was a [[drow]] of [[House Xorlarrin]] and a twin son of the archmage of [[Q'Xorlarrin]], [[Tsabrak Xorlarrin]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], during the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Tsabrak appointed Alak and his twin sister [[Alystin Xorlarrin]] to find and take control of the [[Fell Fortress]] in order to create an [[undead]] army. However, an adventuring party hired by the [[dwarf]] mystic [[Axelcrantz]] confronted and defeated them.
